alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, west central Jefferson and Leon Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Woodville, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Cody, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Eight Mile Pond, Quincy Airport, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
